questions: Does this landing page feature a clean and modern design? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a hero section on this landing page? Answer with yes or no.
Does the hero section showcase an image of the shampoo bottle? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a catchy headline that says 'Transform Your Hair Today'? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a call-to-action button like 'Shop Now' or 'Learn More'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the text in the generated picture clear and readable?  Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
no - The design elements appear cluttered and inconsistent, which does not convey a modern aesthetic.
yes - There is a distinct section at the top featuring a primary display.
no - The hero section features a bottle, but it is not clear that it is a shampoo bottle.
no - The headline 'Transform Your Hair Today' is not visible.
no - The text is unclear and does not definitively show a call-to-action button like 'Shop Now' or 'Learn More'.
no - The text throughout the image is distorted and difficult to read.
